snippet: As Donald J. Trump moves closer to the Republican nomination, his unpopularity with large groups of voters suggests a potentially staggering loss in a general election.
abstract: Polls show Donald J Trump would face daunting obstacles in defeating Hillary Clinton if both are successful in securing their parties' presidential nominations, with electoral odds stacked strongly against him; negative attitudes toward Trump are so strong that his nomination could lead to tight races in several Republican states in general election.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and NATE COHN

lead_paragraph: As Donald J. Trump moves closer to the Republican nomination, his unpopularity with large groups of voters suggests a potentially staggering loss in a general election.

headline.main: Electoral Map Is a Reality Check to Donald Trump’s Bid
headline.print_headline: Electoral Map a Reality Check to a Trump Bid
